name: Katformer! (ALPHA)
description:
Katformer!  The platformer featuring meeeee :333

As of now, it only has a grand total of 3 levels with the most basic hub world imaginable.

If you get stuck on a level, you can press [R] to restart unlike the previous katformer.

If you're curious about the level ranking system, it goes as follows: X, S, A, B, C, then D.

I will definitely be working on this and will try to release it as a full game eventually.

Enjoy!
